title: SECRETS ABOUT SYMBOLISM / QUANTUM PSI NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS
description:
In this video, Dr. Paret will share some secrets about symbolism, Quantum Psi, and non-verbal hypnosis in general. He is the world-leading authority in this field and he teaches the ancient traditions of Mesmerism and Fascination - the hypnotic power of the gaze, in modern times. Fascination is the main key to the hypnotic states. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.

Subscribe to our YouTube channel for more free lessons and useful techniques:
